There are 8 results displayed, with the first product being the Scosche PowerVolt PD30 USB-C 30W Power Delivery Mini Fast Charger, priced at $27.99 after a $7 discount. The page also allows sorting by "Best Match" and filtering options, and the delivery location is set to Seattle.
